Title: Provides for direct-pay tax abatement credits for solar electric generating systems and electric energy storage systems in connection with eligible buildings
Summary: Provides for direct-pay tax abatement credits for solar electric generating systems and electric energy storage systems in connection with eligible buildings; provides such eligible properties shall include: 501(c)(3) corporations, associations, organizations or trusts and income-restricted affordable housing properties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing for a direct-pay tax abatement credit for solar electric generating systems and electric energy storage systems in connection with eligible buildings
